Shadowroot sacs were small, faintly glowing, bulbous fungus growths found in the Shadow-cursed Lands surrounding Moonrise Towers in the Western Heartlands in the late 14 and 15 centuries DR.
thumb|Shadowroot vitriol.
Despite their overwhelmingly putrid stench, shadowroot sacs were harvested for their alchemical properties. The sacs and their secretions were refined into a vitriol that possessed a peculiar effect on those who smelled it. This vitriol had a smell of cloying sweetness but provoked bile rising in ones throat. The same smell seemingly sharpened the senses of those who smelled it.
Shadowroot vitriol could be combined with certain types of ashes to brew elixirs of viciousness.
